alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, north central Madison, southwestern Cook, southeastern Grady, western Lowndes, Thomas, Brooks and southern Colquitt Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomasville, moving east at 25 to 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Valdosta, Thomasville, Madison, Quitman, Hahira, Boston, Pavo, Coolidge, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Cecil, Dillon, Greggs, Everett, Pinetta, Merrillville and Lovett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
